deshagunika wiparyasawalata anugathawima ha harithagara wayu wishama wima awama kirima sandaha sudusu thakshanaya handunaganimata goliya parisarika pahasukam aayathanayanhi aadhara athiwa thakshana awashyatha thakseru kirime wyapruthiya danatamath kriyathmaka wemin pawathi.wasara 2020 wana wita wana aawaranaya samastha bhumi pramanayen siyayata 35dakwa wardhanaya kirime aramunin 'dayata sewana' 'haritha gammana' 'alankara nagara' 'piyakaru purawara' wani de aawaranaya wardhanaya kirime wadasatahan danatamath kriyathmaka wemin pawathina bawa mudal ha kramasampadana amathyanshaya kiyayi.kese wuwada yogya kriyamarga thulin parisarika chirasthayithawaya ha parisara paddhathi samathulithathawaya aaraksha kirima sandaha thawaduratath piyawara gatha yuthu wana athara ee sandaha punarjananiya balashakthi bhawithaya thulin indhana paribhojanaya adukirima wayu piripahadu thakshanaya prawardhanaya kirima wani kriyamarga siyalu parshwayan wisin anugamanaya kala yuthu bawada amathyanshaya penwa deyi..
